page.title: 01AREA REVIEW
page.content: Our section of map is a rural area comprising many small village communities, as well as part of Falmouth, the nearest town.We are very conscious of the fact that we are never far from the sea, Falmouth having grown up from the port site,near the docks.It follows that the two most important sources of employment are the docks and the tourist industry. Inland,farming is a major occupation.There is very little other industry in the area. Although new housing is being built in Budock to accomodate young families, we have a very high proportion of retired people in the area, and unemployment is generally high, especially when the tourist season finishes.
